name: Grow The Hottest Chilli in the World
description:
A perfect gift for Chilli lovers or something different for the person who has everything!

Each grow kit contains 3 seeds to optimize your success. This also offers you the potential chance to grow 3 plants in a small plastic starter pot. The starter pots ideal for the first 5 months and also contain soil to the correct PH level. We include a helpful guide to support the chilli growth and you will be well on your way to growing some seriously hot peppers. 

 •Be the talk of the dinner party with these soul scolding chillis.
 •Perfect for practical jokes.
 •Making your own you tube chilli challenge videos.
 •Alpha male challenges. 
 •Or just plain stupidity.

What you will receive:
 The starter kits we retail, provide everything necessary to maximise potential seed growing success.
3X Seed
1 X 9cm pots (including PH ready soil)
& Relevant growing data.

The seed options are as follows



Bhut Jolokia was the world's hottest chili pepper, 400 times hotter than Tabasco sauce; however, as of 2012 it was superseded by the Trinidad Moruga Scorpion

The Trinidad Scorpion Moruga Blend, native to the district of Moruga in Trinidad and Tobago, is currently the world's hottest Chili pepper cultivated. The New Mexico State University's Chile Pepper Institute has identified the Trinidad Scorpion Moruga Blend as the newest hottest chili pepper as of February 2012. According to the Institute, the Trinidad Scorpion Moruga Blend ranks as high as 2,009,231 SHU on the Scoville scale, making it the hottest chili pepper in the world to date. 


Scotch Bonnet is a variety of chili pepper. Found mainly in the Caribbean islands, it is also in Guyana (where it is called Ball of Fire), the Maldives Islands and West Africa. It is named for its resemblance to a Tam o' Shanter hat. Most Scotch Bonnets have a heat rating of 100,000–350,000 Scoville Units.

name: Grow your own Coffee
description:
Not a morning person? shake before you're first cup well now you have the opportunity to well here is you're exciting opportunity to grow your very own coffee bean plant.

Although you are unlikely to get a large crop in this country, this Coffee plant is the same variety from which we get coffee beans and in a warm spot they will eventually produce their distinctive berries.

A Great novelty plants these glossy leaved coffee plants are surprisingly easy to care for. They are best out of direct sunlight and make great house plants as well as conversation piece.
  
Contents of kit 

1X 9cm pot with PH ready soil 
3X Coffee bean seeds

with instructions to grow.

name: Grow your own Olive Tree
description:
fallen out with a friend or a loved one? Well why not take the old saying further by buying them there own olive tree kit
yes have your very own slice of the Mediterranean in your home or garden.

Archaeological evidence suggest that olives were being grown in Crete as long ago as 2,500 B.C. From Crete and Syria olives spread to Greece, Rome and other parts of the Mediterranean area. Olives are also grown commercially in California, Australia and Itay. 

Olive trees are evergreen trees that will add a Mediterranean touch to the garden. They are suited to garden or container cultivation, and may produce fruit in mild regions and warm summers in the UK.

What you will receive

2X Seeds 
1X 9cm pots ( including PH ready soil )

& all relevant growing data

name: Pot-ponics Bio-Bizz Organic Kits
description:
Growing with a BioBizz Organic Kit is very much like ordinary soil gardening, only better! You put your plants in your pots (with saucers underneath) and fill them with BioBizz Soil Mix... simple as that! Then just feed your plants being careful not to over or under water the pots. If pots feel light your plants are probably thirsty, if they feel heavy then your plants are probably fine. The minimum recommended space required is 90cm x 45cm for the 3 plant system (110cm x 80cm for bigger plants), and 110cm x 90cm for the 6 plant system (150cm x 120cm for bigger plants).

BioBizz Organic 3 Plant Kit includes:

250 Watt Proxima Euro Light System
Exolux Ezi-Roll Light Hangers (pair)
3 x 8 Litre Rhizo-Pots
3 x Brown Saucers
BioBizz Bio-Bloom (1 litre)
5 metres of Total Blackout Sheeting
6 x Jiffy Plugs
BioBizz All-Mix Soil (50 litres)
Comprehensive illustrated GroWell instructions

The BioBizz Organic 6 Plant Kit includes:

400 Watt Proxima Euro Light System
Exolux Ezi-Roll Light Hangers (pair)
Eco-Technics One Light Timer Contactor
Grasslin Mechanical Timer
6 x 8 Litre Rhizo-Pots
6 x Brown Saucers
BioBizz Bio-Bloom (1 litre)
10 metres of Total Blackout Sheeting
12 x Jiffy Plugs
BioBizz All-Mix Soil (50 litres)
Comprehensive illustrated GroWell instructions

name: Grow one of the worlds biggest tree's
description:
Looking to Branch out or maybe something to impress the neighbors?

Well the Giant Redwood ( Sequoiadendron giganteum )one of the massive of the three. In fact, they are recognized as being the most massive of all trees. Not quite the tallest and perhaps not necessarily the broadest, but certainly the heaviest. They were discovered in the early 1850's, growing in the Sierra Nevada, its only known remaining habitat. It can live for more than three thousand years, and can reach a height of over 100 meters. The trunk of these trees is very stout, usually forming a single straight column, and with a marvelous tapering effect at the base. They are covered with a beautiful soft, spongy bark - so soft in fact that one can punch them quite hard and feel no pain.

Contents of kit

1X 9cm pot with PH ready soil 
3X Giant Redwood seeds

with instructions to grow.

Avg. germination time 3 months
